controllers - package controllers
 
createReceive() - Method in class actors.TwitterSearchActor
Handles refresh and search messages Search message - adds a search phrase to a list the Actor would query Refresh message - triggers querying Tweets search service
createReceive() - Method in class actors.TwitterSearchSchedulerActor
Handles refresh and search messages Register message - register the Actor in the list Actors to notify RefreshAll message - sends Refresh message to all Actors in a list
